title: FEATURE JOBS: Edwards and Co., Wasamedia, Broadsheet, oOh Media + More
text:
Edwards and Co. are hiring for a Social Media Manager and Content Creator (SYD, MEL) who is just as comfortable thinking creatively as they are analysing results to work in a fast-paced hair and beauty organisation with both local and global clients. Apply now.

Wasamedia are recruiting for a Junior Account Manager (SYD) to work on their growing portfolio of exciting food, drink and travel clients as part of a fun and vibrant agency culture. Working directly with agency seniors, this is a fantastic opportunity to grow your career at an agency with a focus of promoting from within! Check it out.

Broadsheet seek an Assistant Editor (MEL) to help generate and edit stories, write and report breaking news, commission writers and photographers, publish articles, manage interns, and assist in other day-to-day operations of the publication. Find out more.

oOh Media are looking for a Digital Marketing Specialist (SYD) to own the end-to-end in-house digital marketing strategy & execution process and be responsible for building out and implementing an effective digital strategy across online & social channels. Apply now.

Want more great job opportunities? Here you go:

Integriti Projects is looking for a full-time Architect (SYD) to join their young, dynamic team with a strong brand and culture. Find out more.

Universal Media Co are recruiting for a Digital Marketing Coordinator (SYD) to be involved in the successful operation of a range of digital media groups. Apply now.

Purpose seek a Digital Campaigner (SYD) to work with their team to drive the execution of campaigns projects across email, social, and other digital channels. Check it out.
